text:
.@weijia asks White House Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany why President Trump uses the racist phrase “kung flu” to describe coronavirus.

McEnany does not deny that it is racist and says “the media is trying to play games with the terminology.” https://t.co/tQMnWBeqSz https://t.co/Z5oIJuYlvc
